sentence.Network_en: That area is an ornithologist's paradise.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个地区是鸟类学家的天堂。

sentence.Network_en: The islands are an ornithologist's paradise and a vacationer's delight.
sentence.Network_cn: 群岛是鸟类学家的天堂,度假者的乐园.

sentence.Network_en: In 1900 Frank Chapman , an ornithologist, suggested a count instead of a kill at Christmas time.
sentence.Network_cn: 1900年, 一位鸟类学家FrankChapman建议人们在圣诞节时观测鸟类而不去狩猎它们.

entry.def: Ornithology is the study of birds.

auth_sentence.content: Olivia calls herself a bird-lover who hopes to one day become an ornithologist.

auth_sentence.content: "I was very surprised by this finding," said ornithologist Kurt Burnham who made the discovery.

auth_sentence.content: Ornithologist Ian Wallace has watched the skies wherever he's lived since he was a young man, including London's Primrose Hill.
